QuestData.Title: The Chieftain's Key
QuestData.Description: Sniff... I'm sorry! I didn't mean to get caught! They grabbed me and put this chain on me and left me here! I can't move and my leg fell asleep and I'm hungry!$B$BThe chief has the key... Chieftain Bloodmaw, the other ones said. He's in the north end of the camp.$B$BBut hurry! Please! Don't leave me alone here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Drizle's Key from Chieftain Bloodmaw.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, thank you! I'm getting out of here right away!$B$BAnd if Ferli sent you here... don't tell her I was crying!
